taskbody.prereq: You need to do this first.
taskbody.context: The stage needs to be set just so.

step.cmd: Then this. relcolwidth, keycol=0, scale=200, frame=topbot, expanse=page
Then this. keycol=2, refcols=2, frame=all, expanse=column
Then this. frame=sides, expanse=textline, id=mytable, importance=deprecated, scale=50
conref on table, then on rows

taskbody.example: Here's an example... Insert tab A into slot B.
taskbody.postreq: Now, you too can do this...

chhead.choptionhd:
test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cite test cmdname test codeph test filepath test footnote test italic test inline image: test indexterm test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph [skipping object] test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top
Now I will add the block-like elements, in reverse order:
test ul
test ul again
test ul again again
testing a syntaxdiagram
This is required cleanup in my exampletest pre test pre test pre pt this is a parml test
pt this is a parml test
testing a paragraph. That's a novel idea. well, if it is I should put it in <lq>.
test ol
test ol again
test ol a third time
